definition[0]: someone who is in a position of authority in the army, navy etc
example[0]: a commanding officer of the SAS
definition[1]: someone who is in a position in an organization or the government
example[4]: The document must be certified by the proper officer of the state.
definition[3]: a title for a policeman or policewoman
definition[4]: someone who has an important position in an organization. ‘Officer’ is often used in job titles
